title: Annie stun not working?!?!

replies.body:
Let me guess.

You used molten shield followed after by a damaging spell, did not you?

that now does not stack anymore her passive, if i remember correctly
Yes I did, but Molten Shield adds one stack. I know because I used it before for Q and E before the Q hits the target.

That's really strange! Did this happen in any other matches or just this one? I'd be interested to see if this is caused by a specific item you may have built or if it was just a one-off issue.

Let me know~
I haven't played much since Mage update. But it has happened couple times before.
Well, if you could grab a recording of it happening and toss it in a post to the [Bug Report boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), that'll really help. :)
I could give it a shot.

For what it's worth, I felt that the stun was behaving strangely after the Mid-year Mage Update.

Mind you, I'm a bad Annie player AND the targeting paradigm of the W has been changed, so I dismissed it as me making mistakes and I didn't fill a proper bug report, but it *feels* clunky to men, it happened a lot of times that I all-in someone and the stun doesn't work, much more often than before the rework.
